full_description:
K&F Concept DJI Drone Mini 3 Pro & Mini 3 Drone Filter Set (CPL+ND8+ND16) With a Set of Propellers

The K&F Concept DJI Drone Mini 3 Pro & Mini 3 Filter Set is a well-made equipment that will elevate your aerial imaging talents to new heights. This complete set includes three key filters: CPL (Circular Polarizer), ND8 (Neutral Density 8), and ND16 (Neutral Density 16), all of which are precision-made using AGC optical glass and benefit from a superior 28-layer nano-coating. This combination provides remarkable optical clarity by eliminating glare, reflections, and atmospheric distortions, resulting in pictures that are strikingly clear and bright. The filters are not only optically superior; they also have sophisticated characteristics such as waterproofing and anti-fouling capabilities. This implies that your equipment is resistant to the elements, allowing you to shoot spectacular photos even in adverse weather situations. The darkened surface of the filters is more than just a cosmetic option; it's a deliberate design choice to reduce unwanted reflections and flares, thereby increasing overall image quality. The frame bayonet design is meant to connect perfectly with the lens base of the drone, offering a secure and snug fit. This not only speeds up installation and removal but also guarantees that the filters remain securely in place throughout the flight. These filters are a monument to meticulous engineering, weighing barely 0.7g. They will not affect the gimbal load of the drone, enabling steady and smooth movie recording even in dynamic flight circumstances. This attention to detail extends to the set's free Mini 3 Pro Landing Gear. These additions, which provide more ground clearance, protect critical components during takeoff and landing, resulting in a sturdy platform for your drone. The K&F Concept DJI Drone Mini 3 Pro & Mini 3 Filter Set is a comprehensive solution designed to maximize your drone's photography capabilities. This set is a must-have for drone enthusiasts and pros seeking unrivaled precision and creative flexibility in their aerial photography activities, with superior optical features and intelligent design components.

full_description:
K&F Concept DJI Avata Drone HD Filter Set (CPL+ND8+ND16)

The K&F Concept DJI Avata Drone HD Filter Set includes a carefully chosen blend of CPL, ND8, and ND16 filters. This package is created specifically for the DJI Avata to minimize light and suppress reflections, delivering excellent image quality in a variety of lighting settings. The ND8 and ND16 filters, which decrease down the shutter speed by 3/4 f-stop, are ideal for partly cloudy and bright days, allowing for fine control over motion blur in films and retaining long exposures for dramatic photographs. Meanwhile, the CPL filter reduces reflections and increases color saturation, resulting in vibrant and sharp images. These filters are made from high-quality Japanese AGC glass with an astonishing 28 layers of nano-coating for accuracy and durability. This multi-coating not only eliminates reflections but also provides important qualities like waterproofing, scratch resistance, mildew resistance, and oil resistance, guaranteeing that your photos retain their great resolution. The ultra-light filter frames weigh only 0.5g apiece and are composed of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, ensuring little influence on the drone's performance. The darkened surface prevents reflections and any negative impacts on the photos, preserving the visual integrity of your aerial shots. The filters connect smoothly with the gimbal, offering a solid and firm attachment, while the quick-release design provides easy installation. With the K&F Concept DJI Avata Drone HD Filter Set, quality engineering meets lightweight design for a completely immersive and professional drone photography experience.

full_description:
DJI Mavic Air 2 Intelligent Flight Battery

The DJI Mavic Air 2 Intelligent Flight Battery is designed specifically for the DJI Air 2S and Mavic Air 2 drones. It provides an extended flight time and reliable power management. This high-energy lithium-ion battery offers a maximum flight time of 31 minutes for the DJI Air 2S and 34 minutes for the Mavic Air 2, allowing for longer aerial adventures and capturing more footage. The battery is equipped with the DJI Intelligent Battery Management System, which constantly monitors its status and provides real-time reporting, ensuring that you are aware of the power levels during flight. It incorporates various intelligent battery protection features, such as overcharging and overdischarging protection, as well as low-temperature protection, to ensure the battery's longevity and safety. The battery is a three-cell polymer lithium-ion battery with a rated capacity of 3500 mAh and a rated voltage of 11.55 V. It has a charging voltage limit of 13.2 V. It can be charged within a temperature range of 5° to 40°C (23° to 113°F). The discharge temperature range is from -10° to 60°C (14° to 140°F), allowing you to operate the drone in various weather conditions.

full_description:
DJI Matrice 300 BS60 Intelligent Battery Station

The DJI Matrice 300 BS60 Intelligent Battery Station is a portable and user-friendly solution for charging, storing, and transporting batteries. It is specifically designed to work with TB60 intelligent flight batteries and WB37 intelligent batteries. The battery station has the capacity to charge four drone batteries and four controller batteries simultaneously, allowing for seamless battery rotation during operations. The DJI Matrice 300 BS60 Intelligent Battery Station is compatible with the DJI Matrice 300 RTK drone. Designed in the form of a trolley case, it can be easily carried and transported. The battery station requires a 220-240 V power source for operation. It takes approximately 60 minutes to fully charge two TB60 intelligent flight batteries and 30 minutes to charge them to a capacity range of 20% to 90%. The BS60 battery station should only be used with compatible batteries and should not be used to charge other battery types. In the box, you will find the battery station itself along with a power cable. The dimensions of the battery station are 510×403×252 mm, and it weighs 8.37 kg (18 lbs) without batteries. It has a maximum load capacity of 12 kg (26 lbs). The charging times are approximately 70 minutes for 100-120 V input and 60 minutes for 220-240 V input. The maximum input power is 1,070 W. The operating temperature range is from -20°C to +40°C (-68°F to +104°F).

Connect multiple drones to conduct coordinated operations
full_description:
DJI D-RTK 2 High Precision GNSS Mobile Station

The DJI D-RTK 2 High-Precision GNSS Mobile Station offers a solid platform to more easily establish a GNSS connection when attempting to record centimeter-level precision measurements. Strong, movable dual-stem legs and spiked feet let it accomplish this. D-RTK 2 Mobile Station is DJI’s upgraded high-precision GNSS receiver that supports all major global satellite navigation systems, providing real-time differential corrections that generate centimeter-level positioning data for improved relative accuracy.

Centimeter-Level Positioning

GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, and GALILEO signals are all fully supported by the D-RTK 2 Mobile Station. The D-RTK 2 Mobile Station is simple to set up and offers real-time differential data that allows drones to attain centimeter-level positioning precision. Even in the presence of barriers, the integrated high-gain antenna provides greater signal reception from more satellites.

Stay Connected for Any Mission

The DJI D-RTK 2 Mobile Station offers 4G, OcuSync, WiFi, and LAN connectivity, ensuring continuous, consistent data transmission regardless of the application circumstance. Whether used with DJI Agras drones, the Phantom 4 RTK, or the P4 Multispectral, up to 5 remote controllers can be attached to the D-RTK 2 Mobile Station at once. It can be used with the Matrice 300 RTK to link to several aircraft, enabling coordinated operations involving numerous drones and greatly enhancing efficiency.

Durability You Can Trust

The D-RTK 2 Mobile Station is incredibly portable and up to any work, no matter how difficult, thanks to its IP65 level ingress protection and lightweight carbon fiber body. In order to reduce hazards, the built-in IMUs track motions and calibrate the tilt sensors, alerting the operator to any anomalies during the flight.

A Comprehensive Solution

The DJI D-RTK 2 Mobile Station is compatible with the Matrice 210 RTK V2 and Matrice 300 RTK, as well as the Phantom 4 RTK, P4 Multispectral, MG-1P RTK, Agras T16, and Agras T20. In addition, it supports DPS (DJI Positioning Service), which offers extremely accurate location data within the base station's coverage area, making it the perfect tool for surveying, aerial inspections, agriculture, and other commercial applications.

full_description:
DJI ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera

The DJI ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera integrates a full-frame sensor with interchangeable fixed-focus lenses on a 3-axis stabilized gimbal. It raises the bar for efficiency and accuracy and was created for photogrammetry flight missions.

Extraordinary Efficiency

A full-frame, low-noise, high-sensitivity sensor is part of the DJI ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera, which can cover 3 km2 in a single trip and capture pictures every 0.7 seconds while in flight.

Remarkable Accuracy

The ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera With its centimeter-accurate data recording capabilities and real-time position and orientation adjustment technology, the Zenmuse P1 is outfitted with a global mechanical shutter and the brand-new TimeSync 2.0 system, which synchronizes time among modules at the microsecond level.

Robust Versatility

Create 2D, 3D, and detailed models thanks to the integrated 3-axis gimbal that can be outfitted with 24/35/50mm lenses and the Smart Oblique Capture feature.

Smart Oblique Capture

The DJI ZENMUSE P1 Camera can cover 7.5 km2 in a single workday. Using Smart Oblique Capture, which turns the gimbal automatically to take pictures at the various angles required, you may increase the effectiveness of your oblique photography mission. The efficiency of post-processing will increase by 20% to 50% since only images necessary for the reconstruction will be taken at the boundary of the flying region.

Smart Data Management

The mission name and mission time are immediately linked to the DJI ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera Mission result in the files. a single location for the storage of TimeStamps, GNSS data, and pictures. The MRK files. The intrinsic and extrinsic camera characteristics as well as the RTK status are all included in the image information.

Fieldwork Report

The DJI ZENMUSE P1 drone camera Checks the position data, the number of photos captured, the RTK status, and the positioning accuracy to confirm the data quality as soon as possible after the flight.

2D Orthomosaic Mission

DJI ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera Effortlessly acquires oblique images from multiple angles that meet 3D modeling requirements across industries such as urban planning and centimeter-level accurate cadastral surveys to serve 3D reality models and smart city planning.

3D Oblique Mission

This ZENMUSE P1 Drone Camera Easily acquires oblique images from various angles that satisfy 3D modeling requirements across sectors, such as urban planning and centimeter-level precise cadastral surveys to support 3D reality models and smart city planning.

Detailed Modeling Mission

It acquires ultra-high resolution image data of vertical or slanted surfaces from a safe distance that authentically reproduces fine textures, structures, and features, for comprehensive reconstructions, geological surveys, heritage site conservation, hydraulic engineering, and more.

Real-time Mapping Mission

Utilize DJI Terra to collect spatial data over vast areas in real-time, allowing teams to act rapidly when judgments are needed.

full_description:
DJI Zenmuse H20T Quad-Sensor Drone Camera

The DJI Zenmuse H20T Quad-Sensor Drone Camera is the company's first hybrid sensor device. In comparison to the standard Zenmuse H20, the "T" model adds a fourth sensor, a 640x512 thermal sensor. The DJI Zenmuse H20T model includes the same sensors as the H20 model, including a 12 MP wide camera with a 1/2" CMOS sensor, a 20 MP zoom camera with a 23X hybrid optical zoom, and a laser rangefinder with a range of up to 3/4 miles. The DJI Zenmuse H20T Matrice 300 RTK is best matched against the H20. With its fully integrated design and groundbreaking aerial capabilities, this quadruple sensor system revolutionizes efficiency for a variety of automated applications. Mission efficacy is transformed by the DJI Zenmuse H20T Quad-Sensor Drone Camera, a modern superb system. A series of 20 MP wide-angle photos of the area you identify will be automatically taken by the zoom camera. When an object is identified in the view by a single tap, advanced sensor fusion algorithms immediately reveal its location. The DJI Zenmuse H20T Quad-Sensor Drone Camera can now rapidly switch between zoom, wide, and thermal camera views and preview the zoom FOV while in wide or thermal camera modes.

Four Sensors in One

DJI Zenmuse H20T Quad-Sensor Drone Camera combining four sensors into a single housing, this durable, integrated payload frees cutting-edge intelligent capabilities for DJI's industrial drone platforms. You can catch everything with these four sensors, whether it's up close or far away, during the day or at night, in thermal or full living color.

full_description:
DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera

The DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera integrates a Livox Lidar module, a high-accuracy IMU, and a camera with a 1-inch CMOS sensor on a 3-axis stabilized gimbal. When used with Matrice 300 RTK and DJI Terra, the L1 forms a complete solution that gives you real-time 3D data throughout the day, efficiently capturing the details of complex structures and delivering highly accurate reconstructed models.

Exceptional Efficiency

The DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera Generates true-color point cloud models in real-time or acquires 2 km² of point cloud data in a single flight [1] using the Livox frame Lidar module with a 70° FOV and a visible light camera with a 1-inch sensor.

Unparalleled Accuracy

The DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera Render centimeter-accurate reconstructions thanks to the high-accuracy IMU, a vision sensor for positioning accuracy, and the incorporation of GNSS data.

Ready When You Are

The DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera IP44 rating allows the L1 to be operated in rainy or foggy environments. The Lidar module's active scanning method enables you to fly at night.

Point Cloud LiveView

Real-time point clouds provide immediate insights into the field, so operators are informed to make critical decisions quickly. You can also verify fieldwork quality by checking point cloud data immediately after each flight.

Measurement and Annotation

The DJI Zenmuse L1 Drone Camera Acquire communicates critical dimensions on the point cloud model using measurements and annotations.

One-stop Post-processing

DJI Terra fuses the IMU and GNSS data for point cloud and visible light calculations, in addition to conducting POS data calculations so you can effortlessly generate reconstructed models and accuracy reports.

full_description:
DJI Smart Controller

The Mavic 2 or other aircraft with OcuSync 2.0 can be flown outdoors to the fullest extent possible using the DJI Smart Controller. Even in difficult lighting circumstances, a 5.5-inch built-in screen produces clear, vivid visuals. The DJI Fly App puts you in the air more quickly, clearly, and conveniently than ever before thanks to intuitive controls and pre-installed features like SkyTalk and the DJI GO 4 App.

Ultra-Bright Display

The DJI Smart Controller has a built-in 5.5-inch 1080p screen, providing an ultra-bright display to keep your live feed easily viewable, even in direct sunlight. At 1000 cd/m2, the display is approximately twice as bright as conventional smart device screens.

OcuSync 2.0 Full-HD Video Transmission

The DJI Smart Controller is outfitted with OcuSync 2.0 Full-HD video transmission technology and supports automatic switching between 2.4 GHz and 5.8 GHz, which minimizes the impact of outside interference on drone operation and image quality. Additionally, it guarantees dependable long-range transmission across a 10-kilometer distance.

Efficient and Portable

So that you may take off quickly and never miss a moment of the action, the DJI Smart Controller connects to your drone as soon as it is powered on. The DJI Smart Controller is portable enough to take anywhere and has an integrated design with detachable control sticks.

Reliable in More Environments

The DJI Smart Controller is capable of stable operation in temperatures ranging from -20°C to 40°C, giving you a reliable connection with your drone in more places.

Customized System

You are liberated from the limitations of ordinary mobile devices with the DJI Smart Controller's customized Android system and enhanced DJI GO 4 app, enabling quicker, more targeted aerial creation. For a wide range of additional sharing and editing possibilities, the Smart Controller now enables third-party apps.

Excellent Audio and Video Performance

The DJI Smart Controller comes with a built-in microphone and speaker for expanded options such as live streaming. It can also playback video through the HDMI output port at 4K with H.264 or H.265.

Complimentary Set of Mavic 3 Pro Filters
full_description:
K&F Concept DJI Mavic 3 PRO Drone (CPL+ND8+ND16) Filter Set

The K&F Concept DJI Mavic 3 PRO Drone (CPL+ND8+ND16) Filter Set is an essential accessory for improving your aerial photography and cinematography with the DJI Mavic 3 Pro drone. This precisely produced filter set comprises a Circular Polarizer (CPL), ND8, and ND16 filter, all of which are meant to maximize your images in different lighting circumstances. The filters are made of HD AGC optical glass, which was imported for its remarkable clarity and ability to recover real colors without adding any undesired color cast. This keeps your photographs in high definition and true-to-life quality. Furthermore, the filters are designed to decrease lens glare and reflections, thus improving overall image quality. These filters have 28 multi-layer coatings on both sides of the glass and are supplied with abrasion-resistant and hydrophobic nanoscale coatings. This technology not only enhances surface hardness for longevity, but also makes cleaning a breeze, letting you focus on getting the ideal photo without having to worry about smudges or marks. The CPL filter weighs only 6.9g and the ND filters individually weigh 5.4g thanks to a rigorous lightweight frame construction. This meticulous thought ensures that the filters pass stringent lightweight testing, ensuring that they will not impair the operation of your DJI Mavic 3 Pro gimbal. You may use these filters with confidence without jeopardizing the drone's flying stability. The Circular Polarizer (CPL) is designed to prevent unwanted glare from non-metallic reflective surfaces when shooting outdoors, effectively reducing glare and improving overall image quality. The ND8 and ND16 filters are specifically tailored to slow down the shutter speed by 3/4 f-stop, making them ideal for partly cloudy days and normal sunny days. These ND filters provide better control over shutter speed, allowing you to achieve the desired cinematic effects and image clarity in various lighting conditions. The K&F Concept DJI Mavic 3 PRO filter set combines premium materials, advanced coating technology, and thoughtful design to elevate your aerial photography and videography to new heights. Whether you're a professional drone pilot or an enthusiast, these filters are essential tools for unlocking the full potential of your DJI Mavic 3 Pro drone.

Buy K&F Concept DJI Mavic 3 PRO Drone (CPL+ND8+ND16) Filter Set from Star Tech

One Intelligent Flight Battery delivers a maximum flight time of 34 minutes, providing you greater peace of mind while in the air. The Two-Way Charging Hub can simultaneously charge the remote controller and three batteries. It can also serve as a portable power supply. Propellers designed specifically for the DJI Mini 3 Pro make less noise and have undergone thorough dynamic balancing testing to provide the aircraft with improved aerodynamic efficiency and powerful push. full_description:
DJI RC Drone Remote Controller

The DJI RC Drone Remote Controller is a cutting-edge and feature-rich device designed to enhance your aerial drone piloting experience. Compatible with various DJI drone models, this remote controller boasts an array of impressive functionalities that cater to both beginners and seasoned drone enthusiasts. Its sleek and ergonomic design ensures comfortable handling, allowing users to fly their drones with ease and precision. The built-in 5.5-inch Full HD display provides a crisp and clear live view of your drone's camera feed. This allows you to frame your shots accurately and view real-time footage without the need for a separate smartphone or tablet. The remote controller is equipped with advanced O3+ video transmission technology that enables a remarkable 15-kilometer range for transmitting live video from your drone. This extended range ensures a stable and uninterrupted connection, even in remote or challenging environments. The DJI RC Drone Remote Controller strikes an excellent balance between portability and endurance. Weighing just 390 grams, it is easy to carry on outdoor adventures. Moreover, the high-capacity battery allows for an impressive 4-hour operating time, reducing the need for frequent recharging during extended flights. The controller features dual-spring control sticks that offer precise and responsive flight control. The balanced tension of the sticks provides a natural and intuitive piloting experience, enhancing your ability to execute smooth and precise maneuvers. With the inclusion of various common ports, the DJI RC Drone Remote Controller offers versatile connectivity options. It features USB, HDMI, and microSD card slots, enabling effortless data transfer, connecting external devices, or even backing up your flight data. The DJI RC Drone Remote Controller is a powerful tool that elevates your drone piloting to new heights. Whether you're a professional aerial photographer or a recreational flier, this remote controller empowers you with its impressive features, intuitive design, and reliable performance, making every flight an enjoyable and productive experience. It is compatible with DJI Mavic 3 Pro, DJI Mavic 3 Pro Cine, DJI Mavic 3 Classic, DJI Mavic 3, DJI Mavic 3 Cine, DJI Mini 3 Pro, DJI Mini 3, DJI Air 2S.

full_description:
DJI Zenmuse H20N UAV Load Gimbal Camera

The DJI Zenmuse H20N UAV load gimbal camera represents a leap forward in aerial imaging technology, offering an unparalleled combination of features that elevate its performance to new heights. Designed to empower professionals in various industries, this cutting-edge camera system boasts a host of advanced sensors and functionalities that make it a versatile solution for a wide range of scenarios. At the heart of the Zenmuse H20N's capabilities lie its zoom and wide-angle cameras, both equipped with state-of-the-art starlight sensors. These sensors push the boundaries of low-light performance, allowing the camera to capture clear and detailed images even in challenging lighting conditions. Whether it's a dimly lit environment or the cover of darkness, the starlight sensors ensure that you can effectively navigate and capture crucial visual information. The Zenmuse H20N doesn't stop at just starlight sensors. It raises the bar with its hybrid payload configuration that comprises twin zoom thermal cameras and a laser rangefinder. This combination of technologies transforms the camera system into an adaptable tool that can tackle a diverse array of situations. With the twin zoom thermal cameras offering 2x and 8x zoom capabilities, the Zenmuse H20N enables users to visualize thermal data and analyze heat signatures with remarkable precision. The laser rangefinder adds another layer of functionality, providing accurate distance measurements from 3 meters to an impressive 1200 meters, with an impressive accuracy of ± (0.2 m + D×0.15%). The Zenmuse H20N doesn't compromise on image quality either. The infrared zoom and night vision zoom cameras offer exceptional optical performance. The infrared zoom camera features a resolution of 640×512 and offers 2x zoom (Equivalent Focal Length: 53 mm) and 8x zoom (Equivalent Focal Length: 196 mm). On the other hand, the night vision zoom camera boasts 4MP and a remarkable 20× optical zoom, with a maximum zoom of 128×. This exceptional zoom capability ensures that even the finest details are captured, enabling users to gain insights and make informed decisions based on the captured visuals. When paired with the Matrice 300, the Zenmuse H20N unleashes its true potential. The combined capabilities of these technologies allow users to extend their vision beyond the limitations of darkness. With the Zenmuse H20N's advanced sensors and the Matrice 300's robust flight capabilities, you'll be able to gather critical information, assess situations, and conduct operations with confidence, even in challenging environments. The Zenmuse H20N has redefined what's possible in the world of aerial imaging. Its advanced features, starlight sensors, hybrid payload configuration, and exceptional zoom capabilities make it an indispensable tool for professionals across industries. From search and rescue operations to environmental monitoring, infrastructure inspection, and more, the Zenmuse H20N stands ready to capture the unseen, pierce through darkness, and empower users with the insights they need to excel in their endeavors.

full_description:
DJI Matrice 300 TB60 Intelligent Flight Battery

The DJI Matrice 300 TB60 Intelligent Flight Battery is specifically designed for use with the DJI Matrice 300 RTK drone. It features a high capacity of 5,935 mAh and a voltage of 52.8 V, providing reliable power for extended flight times. The battery utilizes LiPo 12S technology, ensuring stable and efficient performance. With an energy capacity of 274 Wh, it offers ample power for demanding aerial operations. The net weight of the battery is approximately 1.35 kg, contributing to the overall lightweight design of the Matrice 300 system. The operating temperature range of the battery is from -20 to 50 °C, allowing for reliable performance in various environmental conditions. It is important to store the battery within the optimal temperature range of 22 to 30 °C to maintain its longevity. The battery can be safely charged within a temperature range of -20 to 40 °C.

full_description:
DJI RC Pro Drone Remote Controller

The DJI RC Pro Remote Controller with you can fly your drone with an all-in-one solution that can be customized and expanded to fit your flying style. With the RC Pro, you can live stream what the drone views without taking out your phone since it has a built-in 5.5" 1080p 10-point touchscreen that is optimized for use with the Mavic 3, Mavic 3 Cine, or Air 2S. Although the display is set up for outside viewing, it may be put into the outside mode to automatically adapt for usage in all lighting settings, even direct sunlight. You may utilize the Mini HDMI connection to send the video to an extra display as you get the live stream from the drone, enabling the rest of your crew to watch along. A 2.4/5.8 GHz dual-band Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) network connection with 2 x 2 MIMO is included for additional functionality so that the built-in browser may access the internet. You can side-load your own APK or use that method to install third-party applications. Four buttons on the RC Pro may be modified to fit your piloting style using the DJI Fly app, further personalizing your experience. It's compatible with DJI Mavic 3 Pro, DJI Mavic 3 Pro Cine, DJI Mavic 3 Classic, DJI Mavic 3, DJI Mavic 3 Cine, DJI Mini 3 Pro, DJI Air 2S.
